text: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged, for the Lord your God will be with you wherever you go.
author: Joshua 1:9

text: Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud.
author: 1 Corinthians 13:4

text: The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing.
author: Psalm 23:1

text: Weeping may stay for the night, but rejoicing comes in the morning.
author: Psalm 30:5

text: I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.
author: Philippians 4:13

text: Therefore do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about itself.
author: Matthew 6:34

text: Let your speech always be gracious, seasoned with salt, so that you may know how you ought to answer each person.
author: Colossians 4:6

text: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.
author: Jeremiah 29:11

text: Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.
author: 1 Peter 5:7

text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, forbearance, kindness, goodness, faithfulness.
author: Galatians 5:22

text: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.
author: Romans 8:28

text: Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
author: Philippians 4:6

text: The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still.
author: Exodus 14:14

text: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.
author: Matthew 5:4

text: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.
author: Romans 8:28

text: I sought the Lord, and he answered me; he delivered me from all my fears.
author: Psalm 34:4

text: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
author: Psalm 46:1

text: For God has not given us a spirit of fear, but of power and of love and of a sound mind.
author: 2 Timothy 1:7

text: Be still, and know that I am God.
author: Psalm 46:10

text: Delight yourself in the Lord, and he will give you the desires of your heart.
author: Psalm 37:4

text: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.
author: Proverbs 3:5-6

text: The Lord your God is with you, the Mighty Warrior who saves.
author: Zephaniah 3:17

text: Humble yourselves before the Lord, and he will lift you up.
author: James 4:10

text: So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God.
author: Isaiah 41:10

text: The Lord is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.
author: Psalm 34:18

text: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.
author: Psalm 147:3

text: We are hard pressed on every side, but not crushed; perplexed, but not in despair; persecuted, but not abandoned; struck down, but not destroyed.
author: 2 Corinthians 4:8-9

text: Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I will fear no evil, for you are with me; your rod and your staff, they comfort me.
author: Psalm 23:4

text: The Lord is my light and my salvation— whom shall I fear? The Lord is the stronghold of my life— of whom shall I be afraid?
author: Psalm 27:1

text: Do not let your hearts be troubled. You believe in God; believe also in me.
author: John 14:1

text: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.
author: Psalm 55:22

text: Rejoice in the Lord always. I will say it again: Rejoice!
author: Philippians 4:4

text: Let us not become weary in doing good, for at the proper time we will reap a harvest if we do not give up.
author: Galatians 6:9

text: In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make straight your paths.
author: Proverbs 3:6

text: Do not fear, for I have redeemed you; I have summoned you by name; you are mine.
author: Isaiah 43:1

text: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.
author: Jeremiah 29:11

text: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
author: Psalm 46:1

text: Let everything that has breath praise the Lord. Praise the Lord.
author: Psalm 150:6

text: But those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary; they will walk and not be faint.
author: Isaiah 40:31

text: The righteous cry out, and the Lord hears them; he delivers them from all their troubles.
author: Psalm 34:17

text: The Lord is gracious and righteous; our God is full of compassion.
author: Psalm 116:5

text: The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusts in him, and he helps me.
author: Psalm 28:7

text: Blessed are those who are persecuted because of righteousness, for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.
author: Matthew 5:10

text: Do not be afraid of the terrors of the night, nor the arrow that flies in the day.
author: Psalm 91:5

text: The eyes of the Lord are on the righteous, and his ears are attentive to their cry.
author: Psalm 34:15

text: He gives strength to the weary and increases the power of the weak.
author: Isaiah 40:29

text: You are my refuge and my shield; I have put my hope in your word.
author: Psalm 119:114

text: Do not be afraid, little flock, for your Father has been pleased to give you the kingdom.
author: Luke 12:32

text: You will keep in perfect peace those whose minds are steadfast, because they trust in you.
author: Isaiah 26:3

text: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.
author: Psalm 46:1

text: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings, you will find refuge.
author: Psalm 91:4

text: Jesus said, 'I am the way and the truth and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.'
author: John 14:6

text: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.
author: John 3:16

text: You are the light of the world. A town built on a hill cannot be hidden.
author: Matthew 5:14

text: He who dwells in the secret place of the Most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.
author: Psalm 91:1

text: A cheerful heart is good medicine, but a crushed spirit dries up the bones.
author: Proverbs 17:22

text: The Lord will fulfill his purpose for me; your steadfast love, O Lord, endures forever.
author: Psalm 138:8

text: No weapon forged against you will prevail, and you will refute every tongue that accuses you.
author: Isaiah 54:17

text: Even youths grow tired and weary, and young men stumble and fall; but those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength.
author: Isaiah 40:30-31

text: You have made known to me the paths of life; you will fill me with joy in your presence.
author: Acts 2:28

text: As a father has compassion on his children, so the Lord has compassion on those who fear him.
author: Psalm 103:13

text: I will praise the Lord all my life; I will sing praise to my God as long as I live.
author: Psalm 146:2

text: There is no fear in love. But perfect love drives out fear.
author: 1 John 4:18

text: You are my hiding place; you will protect me from trouble and surround me with songs of deliverance.
author: Psalm 32:7

text: I will never leave you nor forsake you.
author: Hebrews 13:5

text: For you created my inmost being; you knit me together in my mother’s womb.
author: Psalm 139:13

text: He gives power to the weak and strength to the powerless.
author: Isaiah 40:29

text: I will not leave you as orphans; I will come to you.
author: John 14:18

text: In the world you will have tribulation. But take heart; I have overcome the world.
author: John 16:33

text: God will wipe every tear from their eyes.
author: Revelation 21:4

text: If God is for us, who can be against us?
author: Romans 8:31

text: Let us run with perseverance the race marked out for us, fixing our eyes on Jesus, the pioneer and perfecter of faith.
author: Hebrews 12:1-2

text: The Lord is good, a refuge in times of trouble. He cares for those who trust in him.

text: You will seek me and find me when you seek me with all your heart.
author: Jeremiah 29:13

text: Do not be afraid, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God.

text: The Lord is gracious and compassionate, slow to anger and rich in love.

text: Your word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

text: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

text: Be on your guard; stand firm in the faith; be courageous; be strong.

text: For everything there is a season, and a time for every matter under heaven.

text: The Lord is my strength and my song; he has become my salvation.

text: I have told you this so that my joy may be in you and that your joy may be complete.

text: The Lord bless you and keep you; the Lord make his face shine on you and be gracious to you.
